name: Inexto
goal:
• INEXTO’s mission is to offer cutting edge serialization, authentication and track & trace solutions to support clients in securing their supply chain, for more transparency, safety and ethics in trade flows
• INEXTO provides, in response to regulatory requirements, industrial, cost effective solutions compliant with open standards
interests: Agriculture, Business and Industry, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Economy, finance and the euro, External Relations, Food Safety, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: Tracking and Tracing of exciseable products, Tracking and Tracing of non-exciseable products to protect consumers from the consequences of illicit trade, counterfeit products and falsified medecines
